00026 
00027 
00028 
00029 namespace votca { namespace ctp {
00030 
00031 class Topology;
00032 class Molecule;
00033 class Segment;
00034     
00043 class Fragment {
00044 public:
00045 
00046      Fragment(int id, string name) : _id(id), _name(name), _symmetry(-1) { }
00047      Fragment(Fragment *stencil);
00048     ~Fragment();
00049     
00050     void Rotate(matrix spin, vec refPos);    // rotates w.r.t. center of map
00051     void TranslateBy(const vec &shift);
00052     void RotTransQM2MD();
00053 
00054     inline void setTopology(Topology *container) { _top = container; }
00055     inline void setMolecule(Molecule *container) { _mol = container; }
00056     inline void setSegment(Segment *container)   { _seg = container; }
00057     void        AddAtom( Atom* atom );
00058     void        AddPolarSite(PolarSite *pole);
00059 
00060     Topology            *getTopology() { return _top; }
00061     Molecule            *getMolecule() { return _mol; }
00062     Segment             *getSegment()  { return _seg; }
00063     vector< Atom* >     &Atoms() { return _atoms; }
00064     vector<PolarSite*>  &PolarSites() { return _polarSites; }
00065 
00066     const int    &getId() const { return _id; }
00067     const string &getName() const { return _name; }
00068 
00069     void         Rigidify(bool Auto = 0);
00070     void         setSymmetry(int sym) { _symmetry = sym; }
00071     const int   &getSymmetry() { return _symmetry; }
00072     void         setTrihedron(vector<int> trihedron) { _trihedron = trihedron; }
00073     const vector< int > &getTrihedron() { return _trihedron; }
00074 
00075 
00076     void          calcPos(string tag = "MD");
00077     void          setPos(vec pos) { _CoMD = pos; }
00078     const vec    &getPos() const { return _CoMD; }
00079     const vec    &getCoMD() { return _CoMD; }
00080     const vec    &getCoQM() { return _CoQM; }
00081     const vec    &getCoQM0() { return _CoQM0; }
00082     const matrix &getRotQM2MD() { return _rotateQM2MD; }
00083     const vec    &getTransQM2MD() { return _translateQM2MD; }
00084     
00085     
00086     
00087 
00088 private:
00089 
00090     Topology    *_top;
00091     Molecule    *_mol;
00092     Segment     *_seg;
00093 
00094     vector < Atom* > _atoms;
00095     vector <PolarSite*> _polarSites;
00096     vector< double > _weights;
00097     int              _symmetry;
00098     vector< int >    _trihedron;
00099 
00100     string      _name;
00101     int         _id;
00102 
00103     vec         _CoMD;              // Center of map (MD)
00104     vec         _CoQM;              // Center of map (QM)
00105     vec         _CoQM0;             // Center of map (QM) original (for IZindo)
00106     vec         _translateQM2MD;    // Set via ::Rigidify()
00107     matrix      _rotateQM2MD;       // Set via ::Rigidify()
00108 
00109 
00110 };
